「号令 （二十七）
*The twenty-seventh is the **Incantation of Golden Light** (金光咒),
Within the **profound mysteries of Heaven and Earth** (天地玄中),
All things lack their **original roots** (本根).
Through vast cultivation of **intentional eons** (意劫),
I attain the **powers of this divine method** (神通).
Within the **Three Realms** (三界),
Only the **Dao/Way** (道) is supreme.
My body is enveloped by **golden light** (金光),
Visible yet unseen,
Audible yet unheard.
Embracing Heaven and Earth,
Nourishing all beings,
Reciting this poem ten thousand times,
My body radiates brilliance.
The **Three Realms await my protection** (三界待卫),
The **Emperor of this Dao** (吾帝) welcomes ten thousand gods to pay homage,
Commanding the **Thunder Court’s demons and spirits** (雷廷鬼妖) to tremble in fear.
When malevolent spirits advance,
Within me lies the **Thunderbolt Deity** (霹雳神) concealed and manifest,
Piercing through all layers,
Five **energies** (五气) surge forth,
Golden light swiftly appears,
Shielding the **true scriptures** (真文).
Urgent decree as the law!"*

「号令 （二十八）
*The twenty-eighth is the **Incantation to Hide Along the Road** (Incantation of Concealing the Body on the Path),
**[Seven-skin Grass]** (周毛草) and **seven hides of the Fox** (七皮):
The **grass of Laozi’s Cavern** (老君洞中一株草),
Ever-growing yet never aging.
Mortals grasp it in vain,
But the Teacher uses it as **a host plant for spirits** (寄生草).
The first **soul** (魂) is concealed within the **edge of Heaven’s moon** (天边月),
The second **soul** (魂) within the **sounds of Buddhas and Thunder** (佛雷音),
The third **soul** (魂) has no place to hide—
Within the **Eight Shadows Cavern** (八影洞) it asks the Teacher.
The third **soul** transforms into **three sacred Buddhas** (三尊佛),
The seven **souls** become the **True Martial Deity** (真武神).
Unknown to gods,
Unperceived by spirits,
Malevolent practitioners see it turn to **ashes** (灰尘).
I solemnly invoke the **Six Stars of the Southern Dipper** and **Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper**,
By the **Most High Laozi’s** urgent decree!"*

*Weaving the **seven-skin grass** and **seven hides of the Fox** into the **Taiji Diagram** (太极图),
The disciple commands with hand—the **Teacher’s presence** (老君).*

With **disheveled hair and unbounded spirit** (披头散发) seated in the hall.

Great demons see me and **wail in lament** (嚎啕哭),

The second **soul** (魂) within the **ninth heaven’s clouds** (九霄云),
The third **soul** (魂) has no place to hide—
Within the **Teacher’s Cavern** (老君洞内) it conceals itself.
My first **transformation** (化身) and second **transformation** (化身),
My body becomes the **ninth heaven’s clouds** (九霄云).
The **Ten Great Generals of the Ancestors** (祖师十大元帅) march ahead,
**Thunder Lord and Thunder Mother** (雷公雷母) follow behind.
Mortals who see me live **long lives** (长寿),
Spirits who see me turn to **ashes** (灰尘).
I solemnly invoke the **Six Stars of the Southern Dipper** and **Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper**,
By the **Most High Laozi’s** urgent decree!"*

If you still flow, Laozi watches behind.

**(Thirty-Three) The Mountain-Laying Incantation**
Mountain-laying was originally a rocky peak,
Now I stand firm—let a hundred men carry me!
If anyone dares disturb me,
I take your *yang* lifespan and send it to *yin*.
Fear not any great malevolent arts—
My master has set down the iron *nán* staff,
With a hand-stamped decree upon the earth.
If I now release my command to return,
By human mercy, spare me Laozi’s wrath.
*I solemnly invoke the Six Stars of the Southern Dipper and Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper,*
By the **Most High Laozi’s** urgent decree!
**Command issued.**

**(Thirty-Four) The Second Root-Fixing Method (Do Not Use Lightly)**
The Root-Fixing Master’s art is potent—
Now he sits afar, yet moves unseen.
If summoned, you shall stand—
Life will not be yours.
The incantation:
*"Root-Fixing has its roots born,
You now sit there, fixed in place.
If you dare move or return,
You shall rise—no reprieve.
I solemnly invoke the Six Stars of the Southern Dipper and Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper,*
By the **Most High Laozi’s** urgent decree!"
**Command issued.**

**(Thirty-Five) The Suppression of Malevolent Arts (Using the Well Character)**
Gazing upward at the azure sky,
The Transmitting Master stands before me.
I suppress the *qīngyī* monk,
I suppress the *chìyī* Master of Ritual,
I suppress the *huángyī* Daoist,
I suppress the Hundred-Arts Triad Master.
If a malevolent arts practitioner
Twists his left hand—his left arm detaches,
Twists his right hand—his right arm detaches,
Spews blood from his mouth while chanting,
He shall roll three steps, stumble five steps,
Left eye weeping, right eye bleeding,
His three *hún* souls perish, his seven *pò* souls severed—
Cast into the ten-thousand-fathom well,
Swiftly meet his death.
*I solemnly invoke the Six Stars of the Southern Dipper and Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper,*
By the **Most High Laozi’s** urgent decree!
**Command issued.**

**(Thirty-Six) The Sawing Incantation**
*Heaven’s autumn, earth’s autumn,*
Laozi grants me the slippery *yúyòu* and iron rooster’s egg,
The saw begins to drag—shouting in alarm!
You pull, I pull—
No ascent, only descent,
All who see laugh *haha*,
All who witness laugh *haha*!
*I solemnly invoke the Six Stars of the Southern Dipper and Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper,*
By the **Most High Laozi’s** urgent decree!
**Command issued.**

**(Thirty-Seven) The Dissolving Sawing Incantation**
By Laozi’s decree, descend from the mountain,
Commanding *wǎngliang* to return to their peaks.
In my hand, the seven-skin grass—
All malevolent arts dissolved!
I summon the Heaven-Solving Master,
The Year-Retreating Master, the Month-Retreating Master,
The Transmitting Master to swiftly dissolve and retreat.
*I solemnly invoke the Six Stars of the Southern Dipper and Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper,*
By the **Most High Laozi’s** urgent decree!
**Command issued.**

**(Thirty-Eight) The Iron Shot Incantation**
Laozi’s furnace forged this incantation—
Three thousand three hundred thirty iron shots,
Iron sand.
Descending the mountain, I carry them forth.
Encountering a living man, I grind the millstone,
Pull the cart—my disciple scatters iron shots,
Iron sand,
Wooden boxes, stone millstones—
How dare you pull or push iron shots,
Iron sand?
Boxes and millstones leap at once—
Left push, left leap; right push, right leap!
*I solemnly invoke the Six Stars of the Southern Dipper and Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper,*
By the **Most High Laozi’s** urgent decree!
**Command issued.**

**(Thirty-Nine) The Dissolving Iron Shot Incantation**
Red clouds rise in the sky,
Lu Ban the Master calls me down to retrieve
Iron shots, iron sand,
Golden shots, silver shots, iron sand.
With my decree, a good cart is ready—
Millstones level left and right!
*I solemnly invoke the Six Stars of the Southern Dipper and Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper,*
By the **Most High Laozi’s** urgent decree!
**Command issued.**

**(Forty) The Depositing-Solution Incantation**
At Hongzhou, the Dao was attained—
Lu Ban the Master transmits the truth:
Fifteen *li* ahead, fifteen *li* behind,
Fifteen *li* left, fifteen *li* right,
Fifteen *li* at the center—
Within this hundred *li*,
With a hand’s gesture, I raise the *Qīnglóng Báiǔ* mountains to frame it.
Whether wood or earth—construction begins at once!
*I solemnly invoke the Six Stars of the Southern Dipper and Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper,*
By the **Most High Laozi’s** urgent decree!
**Command issued.**

**(Forty-One) The Iron Eel Incantation**
*Heaven’s autumn, earth’s autumn,*
Laozi grants me the iron eel—
Piercing the sky, it breaks the heavens,
Piercing the earth, it splits the ground,
Forcing apart the earthen walls on either side!
*I solemnly invoke the Six Stars of the Southern Dipper and Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper,*
By the **Most High Laozi’s** urgent decree!
**Command issued.**

**(Forty-Two) The Wall-Moving Method**
The sun rises in the east, illuminating the four quarters,
Setting down copper bricks and iron bricks,
Ten thousand eels cannot pass,
Ten thousand iron oxen are forged—
On all sides, copper fences and iron walls rise.
Fear not malevolent masters contesting arts—
You unleash the iron eel,
I use the cat to devour it.
*I solemnly invoke the Six Stars of the Southern Dipper and Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper,*
By the **Most High Laozi’s** urgent decree!
**Hand-tugging the cat at the copper fence, iron wall—Command issued.**

**(Forty-Three) The Purifying-Mouth Incantation**
The *Dānzhū* mouth spirit spews filth and breathes *qi*,
The tongue spirit declares truth,
*Tōngmìng* nourishes the spirit,
The *Luōqiānchǐ* spirit,
The *Jiéxié* Guardian of True and False,
The *Hǔpēn* spirit exhales essence,
The spirit elixir is forbidden—
I penetrate true thought,
Spirit-refining night *qi* endures forever.

**(Forty-Four) The Purifying-Spirit Incantation**
The *Língbǎo* Celestial Venerable,
Soothing the self-form,
My disciple’s *hún* and *pò*—
I conceal the Mysterious Bright.
*Qīnglóng Báiǔ* march in ranks,
*Zhūquè Xuánwǔ* guard my True One.
Mountain weeds scatter—
Dao *qi* endures forever.

**(Forty-Five) The Summoning Nine-Dragon Sea Incantation**
I pay homage to the Sacred Sovereigns of the East, South, West, and North Sea Dragons,
The Central Dragon Prince and Dragon Grandson—
Swiftly, *Róutuo* sea water rises!
Flooding the house beams—one *chǐ* high,
Flooding to one *zhàng*—beams one *zhàng* high,
Flooding the heavens,
Drowning the True Spirit,
No mercy—swiftly submerge!
*I solemnly invoke the Six Stars of the Southern Dipper and Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper,*
By the **Most High Laozi’s** urgent decree!

Earth conceals the Hundred Mouths.

Year-Month Red Mouths, Hour-Time Red Mouths,
All relatives and guests within and beyond the courtyard—

Laozi’s decree transmitted,
